description: Try our easy to follow Cranberry & White Chocolate Shortbread recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cranberry & White Chocolate Shortbread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt chocolate in microwave in 20 second intervals, stirring in between until smooth. Drizzle melted chocolate over shortbread fingers and sprinkle with extra cranberries. Allow chocolate to set completely. Store in an airtight container.
